zombiehouse.common

Class LevelVar

  • java.lang.Object
    • zombiehouse.common.LevelVar

  • public class LevelVar
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Rob

    Container class - no methods

    Values here are meant to be accessed by a variety of elements and the bottom flags are for changing game play / terminal prints

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Zombie> bifurcatedCollection
      List to hold the zombies that were spawned through bifurcation.
      static double bookcaseSpawnChance
      Controls the chance of bookcase spawn relative to wall.
      static Tile[][] house
      Contains a grid of Tile objects - the architecture of the current level The house Tile[][] is used by both graphics and zombies initialized by Level and filled by ProGen
      static boolean HOUSE_PRESENTATION
      Show the house
      static java.util.ArrayList<Zombie> interactedWithZombieCollection
      List of all the zombies that were engaged with one or more past self's.
      static boolean LEVEL_DEBUG_TEXT
      A debugging flag When true, a stream of text related to level generation will be printed to terminal
      static int levelNum
      The (internal) level number - or number of completed levels so far is used in level generation to increase dificulty
      static double masterZombieSpeedModifier
      This is the modifier for the masterZombie speed, so it will always move x2 quicker than all the other zombies.
      static java.util.ArrayList<PastSelf> pastSelfCollection
      List that contains all the pastSelf's that have been added.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Zombie> pastZombieCollection
      Contains a list of zombies that were engages to past past self's, and this helps with updating the most recent engaged zombies positions to follow.
      static double pillarSpawnChance
      This is the (percent) chance to spawn a pillar at each 'opening' (Not a hugely 'public' scope variable, but was trying to contain all level progression elements in LevelVar)
      static java.util.Random rand
      Is the single instance of Random used by all of level generation (It's seed is saved in level as it is not as public a variable)
      static boolean SPAWN_MASTER
      A debugging flag When true, will spawn the MasterZombie regardless of spawnMonsters flag
      static boolean SPAWN_MONSTERS
      A debugging flag When false, Zombies will not be added to the level
      static double spawnMax
      This is the spawnMax for zombies for the currentLevel, will go up by 5.
      static double spawnRate
      This is the percent chance that a tile will spawn a zombie, this goes up every level by 0.02.
      static double tapestrySpawnChance
      Controls the chance of tapestry spawn relative to wall.
      static boolean WITH_SIGHT
      A 2d animation flag.
      static boolean ZOMBIE_DEBUG_TEXT
      A debugging flag When true, a stream of text related to zombie handling will be printed to terminal
      static boolean zombie3D
      Show the 3-D model
      static java.util.ArrayList<Zombie> zombieCollection
      Contains a complete list of Zombies spawned in the current level The zombieCollection is used by both graphics and zombies initialized by Level and filled by ProGen
      static double zombieSpeed
      Walking speed of zombies

      LevelVar()

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • house

        public static Tile[][] house
        Contains a grid of Tile objects - the architecture of the current level The house Tile[][] is used by both graphics and zombies initialized by Level and filled by ProGen

      • zombieCollection

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Zombie> zombieCollection
        Contains a complete list of Zombies spawned in the current level The zombieCollection is used by both graphics and zombies initialized by Level and filled by ProGen

      • pastZombieCollection

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Zombie> pastZombieCollection
        Contains a list of zombies that were engages to past past self's, and this helps with updating the most recent engaged zombies positions to follow.

      • interactedWithZombieCollection

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Zombie> interactedWithZombieCollection
        List of all the zombies that were engaged with one or more past self's.

      • pastSelfCollection

        public static java.util.ArrayList<PastSelf> pastSelfCollection
        List that contains all the pastSelf's that have been added. At most this will contain three past self's.

      • bifurcatedCollection

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Zombie> bifurcatedCollection
        List to hold the zombies that were spawned through bifurcation.

      • rand

        public static java.util.Random rand
        Is the single instance of Random used by all of level generation (It's seed is saved in level as it is not as public a variable)

      • levelNum

        public static int levelNum
        The (internal) level number - or number of completed levels so far is used in level generation to increase dificulty

      • spawnMax

        public static double spawnMax
        This is the spawnMax for zombies for the currentLevel, will go up by 5. First level 15 Second Level 20 so on.

      • masterZombieSpeedModifier

        public static final double masterZombieSpeedModifier
        This is the modifier for the masterZombie speed, so it will always move x2 quicker than all the other zombies.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • spawnRate

        public static double spawnRate
        This is the percent chance that a tile will spawn a zombie, this goes up every level by 0.02. The spawn amount is still limited by spawnMax

      • pillarSpawnChance

        public static double pillarSpawnChance
        This is the (percent) chance to spawn a pillar at each 'opening' (Not a hugely 'public' scope variable, but was trying to contain all level progression elements in LevelVar)

      • SPAWN_MONSTERS

        public static boolean SPAWN_MONSTERS
        A debugging flag When false, Zombies will not be added to the level

      • SPAWN_MASTER

        public static final boolean SPAWN_MASTER
        A debugging flag When true, will spawn the MasterZombie regardless of spawnMonsters flag
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WITH_SIGHT

        public static boolean WITH_SIGHT
        A 2d animation flag. If playing the 2d view game, this will allow for 'limited' lighting

      • LEVEL_DEBUG_TEXT

        public static final boolean LEVEL_DEBUG_TEXT
        A debugging flag When true, a stream of text related to level generation will be printed to terminal
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ZOMBIE_DEBUG_TEXT

        public static final boolean ZOMBIE_DEBUG_TEXT
        A debugging flag When true, a stream of text related to zombie handling will be printed to terminal
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • zombieSpeed

        public static double zombieSpeed
        Walking speed of zombies

      • zombie3D

        public static boolean zombie3D
        Show the 3-D model

      • HOUSE_PRESENTATION

        public static boolean HOUSE_PRESENTATION
        Show the house

      • bookcaseSpawnChance

        public static double bookcaseSpawnChance
        Controls the chance of bookcase spawn relative to wall.

      • tapestrySpawnChance

        public static double tapestrySpawnChance
        Controls the chance of tapestry spawn relative to wall.
